artist: Edward Chandler Moore; Louis Comfort Tiffany
creditline: Given in memory of Katherine Pillsbury McKee
description: Tiffany dinner fork, from a set of flat silver, hammered sterling silver with gold, copper and bronze ornaments; blade cast by Joseph Rodgers and Sons, London; flora and fauna motif, each piece being individual and distinct
medium: Sterling silver with gold, copper, and bronze ornament
title: Dinner Fork, from a flatware service
